TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DockPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示停駐容器內公開停駐屬性的控制項。

span.span: Represents controls that expose their dock properties within a docking container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停駐容器是可讓排列子系的項目，以水平和垂直方向，相對於停駐容器與容器內的其他項目的界限的控制項。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container. 停駐控制項相對於其他根據其目前疊置順序。較高的疊置順序放置，進一步疊置停駐容器的指定邊緣。Controls are docked relative to each other based on their current z-order; the higher their z-order placement, the further they are placed from the specified edge of the docking container. 請參閱[UI 自動化用戶端的控制項模式對應](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md)如需範例，可以實作此控制項模式的控制項。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern. 不支援停駐容器的任何屬性或可能會停駐在停駐容器內與目前控制項相鄰的任何的控制項屬性。 does not support any properties of the docking container or any properties of controls that might be docked adjacent to the current control within the docking container.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As DockPattern.DockPatternInformation

summary.span: 取得這個 的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用取得屬性的目前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必須從與參考，以取得目前的值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果使用取得、 它只快取資料，包含，並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用取得先前使用指定之屬性的快取的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 這個屬性也可以從擷取或屬性。This property can also be retrieved from the or properties. 預設值是 。The default value is . ## Examples 在下列範例中，值，會取得代表目前停駐位置的控制項，以支援。In the following example, a value is obtained representing the current dock position for a control that supports . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetDockPosition(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition dockPosition) cil managed

param.name: dockPosition
param.span: 相對於停駐容器界限及容器內其他項目的停駐位置。

span.span: The dock position relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.

summary.span: 將 停駐在停駐容器內您要求的 。

span.span: Docks the at the requested within a docking container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停駐容器是可讓排列子系的項目，以水平和垂直方向，相對於停駐容器與容器內的其他項目的界限的控制項。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container. ## Examples 在下列範例中，代表支援 DockPattern 控制項模式的控制項有其`dockPosition`修改。In the following example, an representing a control that supports the DockPattern control pattern has its `dockPosition` modified. [!code-csharp[UIADockPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIADockPattern_snip/CSharp/UIADockPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIADockPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIADockPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIADockPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIADockPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIADockPattern_snip/CSharp/UIADockPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIADockPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIADockPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIADockPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

span.span: When a control is not able to execute the requested dock style.
